.. _SMAPtutorial:

SMAP tutorial
=============

| This is the tutorial for various modules of the SMAP package.  
| Install the SMAP package according to these :ref:`instructions <SMAPhomeinstallation>`.
| Tutorial data may be downloaded from Zenodo (link).  
| The scheme below depicts the various components of SMAP package and a logical order to work through the tutorial.  
| The following sections will be covered by the tutorial:

| * Analysis of GBS data (red arrows)  
| * Analysis of HiPlex data (purple arrows)  
| * Analysis of WGS data (yellow arrows)  
| * Analysis of CRISPR genome editing data (green arrows)  

.. image:: ../images/SMAP_global_overview_tutorial.png
